result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge.

result.eng: She will accept anything you tell her.

result.orig: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.eng: I couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.html: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigríchYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: He would put up with anything for her.
result.ga: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.orig: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.html: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟulaingeoḋ sé rud ar biṫ ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.

result.eng: He didn't really want to steal.
result.ga: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aige
result.orig: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aige
result.html: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aigeHe didn't really want to steal.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ rún ar biṫ gadaíoċta aigeHe didn't really want to steal.
